title: OPL- Can we get VODs and Match History for these games?
body: I love seeing how the Oceanic scene has grown over the past year and having an LCS style format is amazing. But, for those of us who may miss these games live, could we get access to VODs of these games somewhere so we can watch them in our own time? I haven't found any links for anything like this and think this could be worth doing. Please correct me if there is a location for either of these. Thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey man,

You can find vods at the link below

http://oce.lolesports.com/vods
http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania All streams are recorded and stored on the users profile.
